column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My go-to tapas place in Chicago. I can honestly say Ive been here over 10 times in the past year. The staff is great
column3: the only complaint I have is the wait-but thats a good sign
column4: right? We usually make reservations before we come here to avoid the long wait
column6: but sometimes we still end up waiting. Happy hour here is also wonderful- at the bar
